remarks: The subspace orthocomplement for the ` DVecH ` vector space is a polarity.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dochpol.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochpol.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochpol.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochpol.p $e |- P = ( LPol ` U ) $.
dochpol.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochpolN $p |- ( ph -> ._|_ e. P ) $.
